name: St. Martin's Sanatorium
description:
Grinding for views can be hard, so McGee has thought it'd be best to film himself exploring dilapidated and abandoned buildings to offer something new for his growing audience. Of course, there's a reason not many pursue what he does, and the secrets held within the condemned St. Martin's Sanatorium won't be revealed so easily. 

Entry for SCREAMORTALITY

Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • C: Crouch
  • Space: Jump
  • Shift(Hold): Run
  • 1/2/3/4: Switch Items
  • LeftMouse/Ctrl: Throw Items
  • E: Grab Items
  • Esc: Pause

Credits:

  • Developed by Kusark Studios, ImmaNeedTwoGuns, Zegaren, mchaman
  • Voicework:
    • The Ghost of Elizabeth Agustine - Marilynn Kay
    • Streamer McGee - ImmaNeedTwoGuns
  • Design, Story & Scripting - ImmaNeedTwoGuns
  • Programming & AI Development - Zegaren
  • Asset & Map Design, Modeling - Kusark Studios
  • Music & Sound Design - mchaman
  • IT&Github Server Management - Dianya

Content Warnings: Gore, Disturbing Imagery, Strong Language & Cursing
